xss/tinymce_profile.js Configuration File 
{
        //
        // Profile for simple tinymce 
        // theme with autolink plugin
        //
        "encoding" : "UTF-8",
        "entities" : [ "nbsp" ],
        "tags" : {
                "opening_and_closing" : [ 
                        "p",
                        "ul","ol","li", // lists
                        "strong", "em", 
                        "span",
                        "a"
                ],
                "stand_alone" : [ "br" , "hr" ]
        },
        "attributes" : [
                {
                        "tags" : [ "a" ],
                        "attributes" : [ "href" ],
                        "type" : "absolute_uri"
                },
                {
                        "tags" : [ "span" ],
                        "attributes" : [ "style" ],
                        "type" : "regex",
                        "expression" : "(\\s*text-decoration\\s*:\\s*(underline|line-through)\\s*;)*"
                }
        ]
}
